Our Story

IOPAWN was born from a vision to create jewellery that transcends trends, focusing on timeless design and exceptional craftsmanship that speaks to the modern individual.

2020

The Beginning

IOPAWN was founded with a vision to create modern jewellery that transcends traditional boundaries.

2021

First Collection

Launched our debut collection featuring minimalist designs crafted from premium sterling silver.

2022

Sustainable Practices

Implemented eco-friendly manufacturing processes and ethically sourced materials.

2023

Global Recognition

Featured in leading design magazines and worn by influential figures worldwide.

2024

Innovation Continues

Expanding our collection with new techniques and contemporary designs for the modern individual.

IOPAWN

Fine jewellery crafted for the modern individual. Discover pieces that embody elegance and contemporary style.
